title: Drawing, "Augustine, Ambrose, and other Saints"
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and gray wash, black chalk on cream laid paper
markings: Waternark: a star in a shield over the letter M
signed: Signed in brown ink, upper left: beliszar f.
inscribed: Verso: inscribed in brown ink: no. 3 / g. 100
provenance: Giovanni Piancastelli; Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
description: Scene of The Annunciation: Augustine, Ambrose and other Saints standing within ornamental border.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Augustine, Ambrose, and other Saints".
Pen and brown ink, brush and gray wash, black chalk on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund. 1938-88-7087.
